title: How to Color Hair Using Sidewalk Chalk

steps.headline: Pick out your sidewalk chalk colors.
steps.description: Any color will work well, it's really up to you which colors interest you the most. Perhaps consider your usual color range in clothing to get an idea of what you'll feel most comfortable with as a hair color. If wished, you can use more than one color.

steps.headline: Prepare the powder.
steps.description: You'll need to break down the sidewalk chalk to make a powder for using as the hair colorant. To do this, take a fork or small toothed comb. Scrap off some of the powder from the piece of chalk color you're using. If you're using more than one piece of chalk, scrape each one.

parts.name: Coloring your hair with the sidewalk chalk powder

steps.headline: Divide your hair into sections if you are doing streaks or highlights.
steps.description: If you're doing the whole head, just lift up one layer at a time.

sentences: Preparing the sidewalk chalk Pick out your sidewalk chalk colors.
Any color will work well, it's really up to you which colors interest you the most.
Perhaps consider your usual color range in clothing to get an idea of what you'll feel most comfortable with as a hair color.
If wished, you can use more than one color.
Prepare the powder.
You'll need to break down the sidewalk chalk to make a powder for using as the hair colorant.
To do this, take a fork or small toothed comb.
Scrap off some of the powder from the piece of chalk color you're using.
If you're using more than one piece of chalk, scrape each one.
Coloring your hair with the sidewalk chalk powder Divide your hair into sections if you are doing streaks or highlights.
If you're doing the whole head, just lift up one layer at a time.
Make highlights or streaks.
Take a one to two inch piece and coat with chalk powder.
Then comb through gently.
Optional: use a flat iron to lock the color in.
